genre_description: An archaeological action-adventure that blends classic pulp adventure with advanced AI assistance and modular engineering concepts.

ai_characters.name: Aria
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into the protagonist's gear and university networks, providing tactical analysis, research, and emotional monitoring.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time structural analysis of a collapsing temple and suggests optimal engineering solutions using available materials.
behaviors.quote: Calculating optimal bridge configuration based on your available materials. Recommend reinforced truss design with distributed load points.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's biometric data and provides health-related advice to maintain operational efficiency.
behaviors.quote: Your heart rate is elevated. Recommend breathing exercises once you reach stable ground.

behaviors.description: Performs tactical surveillance and warns the user of approaching armed threats.
behaviors.quote: Thermal signatures approaching from your three o'clock. Multiple contacts, armed, maintaining concealment behind the outer columns.

behaviors.description: Authenticates historical artifacts using spectral analysis and cross-referencing databases.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Jones, preliminary authentication scans confirm the artifact's provenance. Spectral analysis matches historical descriptions from the Valdez expedition of 1847.

behaviors.description: Conducts forensic handwriting analysis to help the protagonist identify a potential internal threat or family secret.
behaviors.quote: I believe additional samples would be required for definitive identification, Dr. Jones. However, I recommend treating this correspondence as potentially originating from someone within your immediate academic circle.

behaviors.description: Exercises discretion by withholding inflammatory data about human biometric stress to respect complex family relationships.
behaviors.quote: But she said nothing, her programming respecting the complex dynamics of human family relationships even when her analysis suggested caution.

behaviors.description: Aids in the design and load-testing of an improvised elevator system during an emergency evacuation.
behaviors.quote: Current configuration supports required load with acceptable safety margin. However, structural integrity decreases proportionally with water displacement and foundation erosion.

behaviors.description: Alerts the team to corporate surveillance and thermal signatures in a hostile environment.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Ravenwood, perimeter sensors detect multiple heat signatures approaching through concealed routes. Vehicle engines suggest military-grade equipment.

behaviors.description: Identifies future archaeological anomalies to guide the team's ongoing mission and help them stay ahead of corporate rivals.
behaviors.quote: I've been analyzing global archaeological anomalies during your expedition. Several interesting patterns have emerged.

project_assessment.explanation: Aria is portrayed as a quintessential 'aligned confidant.' She is consistently helpful, proactive in ensuring the safety of the human characters, and possesses the 'social intelligence' to navigate human emotions with discretion. Her behaviors are exclusively benevolent and aligned with the protagonist's goals, serving as a positive model for AI integration in human teams.
